thread.title: Students arrested in assault plot at Summerville
thread.title_full: Students arrested in assault plot at Summerville

title: Students arrested in assault plot at Summerville
text:
Students arrested in assault plot at Summerville Students arrested in assault plot at Summerville By Lyn Riddle, The Union Democrat October 03, 2015 11:11 am 
Four students have been arrested for plotting to assault students and teachers at Summerville High School. 

The investigation began Wednesday when the Tuolumne County Sheriff's Office was contacted by the Summerville High School administration about three students who threatened faculty members and students, according to a press release by the Sheriff's Office. Detectives interviewed the students, conducted searches and identified a fourth student who was also involved. 
The Sheriff's Office said the plan was in the early stages and no one was hurt. 
The students, whose names were not released because they are juveniles, were charged with conspiracy to commit an assault with deadly weapons. 
The Sheriff's Office has scheduled a press conference on the matter at 3 p.m. today. 
Check back this afternoon for more details.
